description: Successful user authentication and navigation to home screen with session establishment

steps.description: Navigate to login screen from app launch
steps.expected_result: Login screen opens with username and password fields visible

steps.description: Enter valid email address in username field
steps.expected_result: Email address is entered and field shows input validation success

steps.description: Enter valid password in password field
steps.expected_result: Password is entered and masked with security dots

steps.description: Submit login credentials
steps.expected_result: Authentication processing initiated and loading indicator appears

steps.description: Verify successful navigation to authenticated home screen
steps.expected_result: Home screen displays with user profile indicator and navigation menu

steps.description: Validate user session establishment
steps.expected_result: Welcome message displays with user identifier

preconditions: Mobile application is installed and accessible

description: Comprehensive product catalog browsing with detailed product information validation

steps.description: Navigate to product catalog from main menu
steps.expected_result: Product catalog screen loads with grid/list view of available products

steps.description: Validate product catalog loads with inventory
steps.expected_result: Product listing displays with minimum 3 products visible

steps.description: Select first available product for detailed view
steps.expected_result: Product detail screen opens with comprehensive product information

steps.description: Verify product title displays correctly
steps.expected_result: Product title is clearly displayed with proper formatting

steps.description: Validate product pricing information
steps.expected_result: Product price displays with currency symbol and proper decimal formatting

steps.description: Confirm product image loads and displays
steps.expected_result: High-quality product image loads without broken image indicators

steps.description: Validate add to cart functionality is available
steps.expected_result: Add to cart button is visible and enabled for interaction

preconditions: Network connectivity for product data loading
postconditions: Product details are completely loaded and visible
Add to cart functionality is accessible
Product information is accurate and complete

description: Complete end-to-end cart functionality with product addition and validation workflow

steps.description: Navigate to product catalog for cart testing
steps.expected_result: Product catalog loads with available inventory for selection

steps.description: Select target product for cart addition
steps.expected_result: Product detail view opens with add to cart functionality

steps.description: Execute add to cart action
steps.expected_result: Product addition processing initiates with visual feedback

steps.description: Validate successful cart addition notification
steps.expected_result: Success message confirms product addition with clear messaging

steps.description: Verify cart counter updates immediately
steps.expected_result: Cart badge displays updated count indicating 1 item added

steps.description: Navigate to cart for validation
steps.expected_result: Cart screen opens displaying added products and total calculations

steps.description: Validate product appears in cart with correct details
steps.expected_result: Product displays in cart with title, price, quantity, and remove option

steps.description: Verify cart total calculation accuracy
steps.expected_result: Cart total reflects correct pricing including taxes and fees

steps.description: Confirm checkout functionality availability
steps.expected_result: Checkout button is enabled and ready for purchase flow

preconditions: Product inventory is available and accessible
Shopping cart is empty or in known state
postconditions: Product is successfully added to shopping cart
Cart counter reflects accurate item count
Checkout functionality is available and enabled
Cart persistence is maintained across sessions

description: Comprehensive authentication failure handling with security validation and user feedback

steps.description: Navigate to login screen for authentication testing
steps.expected_result: Login interface opens with input validation and security features

steps.description: Enter valid username for credential testing
steps.expected_result: Valid email format accepted with visual confirmation

steps.description: Enter invalid password to trigger authentication failure
steps.expected_result: Invalid password entered and masked for security

steps.description: Submit invalid credentials for authentication
steps.expected_result: Authentication attempt processes with security validation

steps.description: Validate comprehensive error message display
steps.expected_result: Clear error message explains authentication failure without exposing security details

steps.description: Confirm user remains on login screen
steps.expected_result: Login interface remains active preventing unauthorized access

steps.description: Verify security-appropriate field handling
steps.expected_result: Password field is cleared for security and retry attempts

steps.description: Validate no unauthorized session creation
steps.expected_result: Username field retains value for user convenience on retry

steps.description: Confirm retry functionality availability
steps.expected_result: Submit button remains enabled for additional authentication attempts

preconditions: Mobile application is installed and accessible
Invalid credentials are available for testing
postconditions: User authentication is denied and session not created
Clear error messaging provides appropriate feedback
Login interface remains accessible for retry attempts
No sensitive information is exposed in error messages
